short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A hub to allow other extension to interact with outside of Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Working together with the native message host[https://github.com/sevenever/chrome-native-message-hub/tree/master/host], this extension allows other extension to easily establish a communication channel to outside of Chrome, without writing its own native message host.
